controls.name: distanceMetric
controls.caption: Metric of the distance between points
controls.descriptions: Method of calculating result distance between two M-dimensional points (a₁,a₂,...,aₘ) and (b₁,b₂,...,bₘ).

controls.name: valuesWeights
controls.caption: Coordinate weights
controls.description: Several weights w1,w2,..., separated by comma/spaces. When calculating distance between two points, specified by two number arrays (a1,a2,...,aM) and (b1,b2,...,bM), every value aK and bK is multiplied by weight wK before all calculations. For example, for Euclidean distance, we actually calculate sqrt((a1*w1-b1*w1)² + (a2*w2-b2*w2)² + ...). If weights are not specified (this string is empty, or number of weights is less than number of columns in "objects_values" array), all skipped weights are considered to be 1.0.

controls.name: maxDistance
controls.caption: Maximal distance
controls.description: If maximal distance is set (some number, not an empty string), and the distance between the given point and all centers is greater than this limit, such a point will be rejected: resulting index will be -1
